reviews.review_msg: I was a student at NFS. He's not a bad guy, and he's clearly intelligent and cares a lot about his students and class. He's a bit eccentric and interesting, tolerable and almost enjoyable overall.

Was a NFS student and Moens is great. Amazing professor to talk to and is always willing to listen to the students. There's a lot of readings for the NFS and it's a intense program with long days, but its well worth it since Moens is always there to help out.

NATO FS 2019 Student, Prof. Moens differs from many fellow Poli Sci/IS profs in his unique world views and personal values, well respected and has some great connections, would recommend to future students to take the NATO FS if it is still available.
